body.name: Evenflo Feeding Premium Proflo Vented Plus Polypropylene Baby, Newborn and Infant Bottles - Helps Reduce Colic - Teal/Green/Blue, 4 Ounce (Pack of 6)

features: EASY TO HOLD - Evenflo Feeding's classic and iconic shape now has a fun, ergonomic twist! These uniquely shaped vented baby bottles are incredibly easy to hold while feeding, ensuring both you and your little one are comfortable.

PREMIUM VENTING - Evenflo Feeding's patented Proflo Venting Technology was developed to ensure milk bubbles stay in the bottle and not in your baby's tummy. This gentle, 1-piece venting system helps significantly reduce the potential for colic, reflux, gas, and fussiness, keeping your baby comfortable even after they are finished eating.

EASY TO CLEAN - Designed with only 3 pieces, the Vented Plus Baby Bottles can be easily assembled and disassembled for a quick, thorough cleaning between feedings. And because there are only a few parts, there is nothing extra to worry about misplacing. These bottles are also dishwasher safe (top rack only), making your life even easier.

PUMP DIRECTLY INTO YOUR BABY BOTTLES - Breastfeeding and pumping can be a time-consuming task and as a mother, you have things to do. Pumping directly into your Baby Bottles is convenient and the Evenflo Feeding baby bottles will fit onto most standard neck breast pumps.
COMMITTED - You’re committed to your child’s safety and so is Evenflo Feeding. Their baby bottles are 100% free of polycarbonates, PVC, and phthalates, and are constructed of food-grade materials.
body.description: Evenflo Vented + Bottles and Proflo Vented Nipples provide a complete line of feeding solutions for your baby's changing needs. Delivering a twist on an iconic classic, The Evenflo Vented + Polypropylene Bottles feature classic styling with an ergonomic shape. These uniquely shaped are paired with patented Proflo Venting Technology. Expertly designed for easy assembly and leak-free feeding, the simple, one-piece integrated nipple and vent system means no extra parts to clean or lose. These soft silicone nipples rapidly vent, directing air bubbles into the bottle, not baby's tummy, which significantly reduces gas, colic, and fussiness. To help take the guesswork out of feeding your little one the Vented + Polypropylene Bottles feature molded measurement markers in both ounces and milliliters to provide an easy and accurate way to measure the volume of liquids without the risk of the measurements washing off. The unique shape, based on Evenflo's flagship design with a lightweight yet ergonomic twist, helps to make these bottles simple to hold, simple to use, and simple to love. An added bonus is that these standard neck bottles fit many standard neck breast pumps so you can easily pump directly into the bottle for added convenience. Rest assured, our bottles are 100% free of polycarbonates, PVC and phthalates, and are also made of food-grade material.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy to Hold The colorful, unique twist shaped bottle is lightweight and easy to hold during feeding. The Nipple The included Evenflo Feeding Vented + Slow Flow Nipple is 100% silicone and features an integrated 1-piece venting system to help reduce the potential for colic, reflux, gas, and fussiness. Vented + Nipples are available in the following flows: Slow, Medium* and Fast*. *Sold separately Easy to Clean Dishwasher safe (top rack only) for convenient and quick cleaning. Pump Compatibility Compatible with all Evenflo Feeding breast pumps and most other standard neck breast pump brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These were recommended by my IBCLC (lactation consultant). I nearly didn't buy them because what difference does a bottle make, right? BUY THESE! Great nipple shape, even better slow flow, and very few pieces to clean. My baby was sucking down bottles, with these he easily gets over 15 minutes. The only down side is the volume is hard to read.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy and no mess
reviews.reviewText: Great bottles, I just ordered more. Helps.my baby with her reflux. Don't leak and easy to read.. Definitely better than the tommee tippee 5 oz bottles! Just tossed those. Such a great price!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 22, 2022
reviews.reviewText: These are the perfect bottles for our baby. He has a mild lip tie which the pediatrician said we don’t need to correct, but it was enough to make nursing directly from the breast impossible and finding the right bottle difficult. First, we tried the Comotomo ones we had been gifted and that was a no go because those are actually terrible for latching. They claim to be “breast like” but nobody’s breast is actually shaped like that while nursing and the baby ends up just sucking on that nipple like it’s a straw - definitely didn’t work for our guy. Next, we tried the Dr. Browns with the wide neck (I had gotten a sample in my Amazon registry box). The wide neck meant the nipple base was still too wide for our guy to latch really well, but they worked okay. Then I ordered the standard neck Dr. Brown’s, which worked pretty well. He still had some leaking issues because I got the sense there wasn’t enough of a nipple base to get a good latch. Then we tried the Evenflo Balance Plus standard neck bottles. I’d seen people raving about them on the internet. I think they are actually the most breast-like bottles I’ve seen, but for our guy that just meant the latch was uncomfortably wide and he crushed the nipple, just like when he did to my nipples when trying to nurse. I did like the fact that the vent was part of the nipple, though. Finally, I found these. They had the same vent design as the other Evenflo bottles, but had a nipple closer to the standard Dr. Brown’s, though with a more substantial nipple base. Now, our little dude eats so efficiently, doesn’t lose a drop out of the sides of his mouth, and latches so well! And we don’t have to worry about cleaning those 2 extra pieces for each Dr. Brown’s bottle.Anyway, TLDR: best bottle ever for a little dude with a lip tie.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 22, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with these inexpensive bottles!
reviews.reviewText: My little guy came home on the ready to us Enfamil bottles with the latex nipples. We were using those until he's gotten to 7 weeks. He was very picky when we tried to change him from ready to use formula and steering away from the latex. We got Dr. Browns, Advent, and Mam bottles and he HATED them all. So I continued with the little 2 oz pre-mades but he is growing and needing more food and the pre-made is so much more expensive. I was desperate so I looked up bottles to transition to from latex nipples and these popped up. Switched to these and its been night and day! Love the size, the cute colors, and while at first I was putting pre-made formula in them he is now happy and I switched to powder with no issues. So glad I stumbled upon these! You can also use the latex nipples in these if you want but he didn't even mind the ones they came with. The only con is that its hard to read the measurement on the side but it's not a huge deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Encourages deep latch
reviews.reviewText: Great bottles. Our baby got used to the Evenflo nipples they provide in the hospital but was not responding well to the nipples that mimic a natural nipple when we got home. These bottles are similar to the hospital issued ones and encourage a deep latch so going between bottle and breast has been easy. Would 100% recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars These were the ones
reviews.reviewText: After trying half a dozen different bottles these were the ones! The one piece vented nipple make it super easy to clean, no other parts to keep track of and after using these, baby didn’t go back to his previous bottles he had been using. And ordering the medium flow nipples from Evenflow’s site was super easy and a drop in replacement for the slow flows.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to clean

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good customer service!!!
reviews.reviewText: I’m amazed. I didn’t think customer service from the seller was even possible but it was! They sent only half the in by accident. After I contacted the seller they made it right and sent it to me! I’m impressed. And the bottles both these plastic ones and the glass ones are great. But bigger nipples when needed at evenflo feeding website. My ibclc approved and they work great.

Muy bonitos, fáciles de lavar, la tetina es muy buena ya que mi bebé no sufre de cólicos y al momento de eructar no saca mucho aire ni se inquieta entre tomas. Plástico no rígido, colores vibrantes, sin derrames. Solo que es difícil ver tantas onzas sirves.
